name: Obfuscated Execution
description: Mimics stealthy script obfuscation (noisy but evasive).

name: Clear Command History
description: Simulates an attacker cleaning bash history.

name: System Information Discovery
description: Gathers subtle info using less common tools.

name: Registry Modification
command: reg add HKCU\Software\FakeKey /v Hidden /t REG_SZ /d Stealthy /f
